snippet: Uber closes a $1.2 billion round of financing. | The owners of the 76ers are taking a page out of the private equity playbook. | Only 11 bidders took part in the second Bitcoin auction. | Microsoft and Barnes & Noble end their Nook partnership.
abstract: Uber closes a $1.2 billion round of financing. | The owners of the 76ers are taking a page out of the private equity playbook. | Only 11 bidders took part in the second Bitcoin auction. | Microsoft and Barnes & Noble end their Nook partnership.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Uber Garners $40 Billion Valuation
